data.title: Wish® Northeastern & Central California and Northern Nevada
data.meta_description: Together, we create life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses – but you can make a child's wish possible. When you donate, you're giving children renewed strength to fight their illnesses, bringing families closer together and uniting entire communities.
data.text:
Donate monthly and know you're helping grant wishes all year long.

Create a legacy that will impact wish kids for years to come.

Share your time and talents and volunteer to transform local lives.

3

For every wish we grant, there are three more children with critical illnesses whose wishes need your financial support

20

Every 20 minutes, a child is ​diagnosed with a critical illness

15

wishes will be granted today because of donors like you
